content:
I'm excited to hear that you're trying out the Simple Tofu Stir-Fry recipe! It's a great dish to experiment with different flavors and ingredients.

For your stir-fry, you can definitely use a combination of broccoli, carrots, and bell peppers. The addition of minced garlic and ginger will give it a lot of flavor. Avocado oil is a healthy and neutral-tasting oil that works well for stir-frying.

Now, let's talk about seasonings and sauces. For a simple stir-fry, you can start with some soy sauce, sesame oil, and a bit of sugar to balance out the flavors. If you want to add more flavor, you can try using hoisin sauce, oyster sauce (if you're not vegan), or even some sriracha for a spicy kick.

Remember to taste as you go and adjust the seasoning to your liking. You can always add more, but it's harder to remove excess seasoning, so start with a small amount
